title: Former NFL Player Quentin Gause On Habits And Mental Toughness
itunes:title: Former NFL Player Quentin Gause On Habits And Mental Toughness
description:
What does it take to reach the kind of success you see every week on ESPN? Although we think of pro football players like gods or superheroes, they’re just people who learned the secrets of hard work and resilience and made shit happen. Now - what would you be capable of if you could harness the same energy?
 
Quentin Gause is a former NFL athlete with a career track record that includes time spent with the Philadelphia Eagles, the Denver Broncos and the New England Patriots. After leaving athletics, Quentin founded Iron Visuals, a visual marketing and branding consultancy that exists to help entrepreneurs and business owners reach their audience with quality content, branding and visual media. Quentin also lends his experience and expertise to kids hoping to earn football scholarships and - eventually - careers in the NFL, and serves as a fitness trainer alongside his other pursuits.
 
On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Quentin break down how a pro athlete attacks each day and maximizes productivity in every part of his life, the teams and players that inspire Quentin daily, and how the lessons learned during his career on the field have led Quentin to grow to great heights in business. Tune in for an interview with a true achiever that will get you fired up to push forward through whatever roadblock you got in front of you. 
 
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/quentin-gause
 
Get More Involved:

  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
